posts.name: Harry Potter's Wand
posts.text: The wand that chose Harry Potter, the Boy Who Lived, when he visited Ollivanders Wand shop at 11 years of age. Take home one of the most iconic and recognisable props from the Harry Potter film series, this high-quality replica of Harry Potter's wand.

posts.name: Harry Potter's Wand
posts.text: The wand that chose Harry Potter, the Boy Who Lived, when he visited Ollivanders Wand shop at 11 years of age. Take home one of the most iconic and recognisable props from the Harry Potter film series, this high-quality replica of Harry Potter's wand.

posts.name: Professor Dumbledore's Wand
posts.text: Take home Professor Albus Dumbledore’s famous wand, also known as the Elder Wand. Stay loyal to one of Hogwarts’ most famous Headmaster’s with this replica wand.

posts.name: Ron Weasley's Wand
posts.text: The wand of Ron Weasley, founding member of Dumbledore’s Army, Gryffindor Keeper and best friend to Harry Potter and Hermione Granger.

posts.name: Sirius Black's Wand
posts.text: Add this high-quality wand replica to your Harry Potter collection. Take home Sirius Black's wand, godfather of Harry Potter, a member of the Order of The Phoenix and one of the authors of the Marauders Map.

posts.name: Newt Scamander's Wand
posts.text: Newt Scamander is a magizoologist and author of “Fantastic Beasts and Where to Find Them,” a book on magical creatures owned by Harry Potter during his tenure at Hogwarts School.

posts.name: Queenie Goldstein's Wand
posts.text: Queenie Goldstein is the sister of Porpentina and holds a menial position in the Wand Permit Office at MACUSA when she and Tina meet Newt Scamander. She is brave, very empathic, and highly skilled in the art of Legilimency.

posts.name: Gellert Grindelwald's Wand
posts.text: Gellert Grindelwald was a very powerful wizard who wished to end the International Statute of Secrecy and create a world order ruled by witches and wizards. He was a former friend of Albus Dumbledore and possessor of the Elder Wand, which he stole from Gregorovitch

posts.name: Albus Dumbledore's Wand - Fantastic Beasts
posts.text: Add this high-quality replica Albus Dumbledore wand to your Harry Potter and Fantastic Beasts collectibles. In Fantastic Beasts: The Crimes of Grindelwald, Dumbledore is not yet in possession of the familiar Elder Wand. Instead, when we meet the 'young' Professor Dumbledore, his wand is a darker colour with intricate turns.

posts.name: Seraphina Picquery's Wand
posts.text: Add this high-quality Seraphina Picquery authentic wand recreation from the Fantastic Beasts and Where to Find Them to your Harry Potter collection.

posts.name: Golden Snitch Wand
posts.text: Inspired by the delicate, winged Quidditch ball is this Golden Snitch Wand. The wand features intricate gold detailing of the iconic winged ball and is complete with a metallic gold finish.

posts.name: The Gryffindor Mascot Wand
posts.text: Inspired by the bold and mighty animal of Gryffindor House, the Gryffindor Mascot Wand celebrates leonine courage and daring in the face of conflict. Perfect for all proud Gryffindors, this design is for those who valiantly roar into the unknown.

posts.name: The Locket Of Slytherin Wand
posts.text: A wand inspired by the Slytherin Locket artefact, with an octagonal handle like the eight-sided locket. The wand is embellished with etched runes and includes an emerald-like stone, evocative of the locket's decorative features. A proud Slytherin who seeks artefacts from the House's past will not resist this wand.

posts.name: The Cup of Hufflepuff Wand
posts.text: A design is inspired by elements of Helga Hufflepuff’s cup, with a gold fluted handle and topped by a relief sculpture of a badger, the House mascot. This wand is for Hufflepuff students who cherish the history of their house-founder and always seeks to emulate her kind and fair demeanour.

posts.name: The Diadem of Ravenclaw Wand
posts.text: Inspired by the powerful and famed Diadem of the Ravenclaw House is this bespoke Diadem of Ravenclaw Wand. This ornate wand features decorative detailing of the lost Diadem including pristine sapphire-like stones, and unique metalwork on its handle. Created with the Ravenclaw house in mind, this unique wand is designed for a Ravenclaw who finds guidance in her wise words. The wand measures approximately 18 inches long and is complete with a deluxe collector’s box.

posts.name: Professor Dumbledore's Wooden Wand
posts.text: Best known as the Headmaster of Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry, Albus Dumbledore was recognised as the master of the Elder Wand. As one of the three objects to make up the Deathly Hallows and crafted with the tail hair of a Thestral, this legendary wand is said to be the most powerful in existence.

posts.name: Hermione Granger's Wooden Wand
posts.text: Hermione Granger was best known for having a keen mind, a valiant heart, and the ability to excel in all her studies. She was an invaluable friend of Harry Potter and ally in the fight against Lord Voldemort. Made with unique vine wood and a dragon heartstring core, Hermione’s wand was acquired at Ollivanders shop in Diagon Alley.

posts.name: Harry Potter's Wooden Wand
posts.text: One of the most famous wizards of all time, Harry Potter learnt on his 11th birthday that he was destined to attend Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry. Harry acquired his powerful wand at Ollivanders shop in Diagon Alley which was made with unique holly wood with a phoenix feather core.
